ModuleDescriptions.kernosklad: Accounting and organization of core storage

DolonDescription: Dolon. Geological and Mining cloud ecosystem

ThirdBlockDolonDescription.1: The cloud ecosystem Dolon is a comprehensive solution for mining and geological professionals to work with a large amount of data.
ThirdBlockDolonDescription.2: The system is web-oriented and cross-platform, which allows users to work through a web browser on any device, with no need to install a set of complex software.
ThirdBlockDolonDescription.3: Working with data flows can be done from any place, not requiring to be tied to a certain workplace. This allows users to receive information and reports in real time and allows all departments of the company to work in a coordinated way, with up-to-date information and centralized database.

UniqueBlock: The Uniqueness of the Dolon Ecosystem

SlideBlockWebOrientDesc.1: Dolon is a cross-platform, web- oriented solution that has several key advantages over traditional desktop applications.
SlideBlockWebOrientDesc.2: With Dolon, users can access the system from anywhere with an internet connection without having to install the application on any devices. This makes it fast and easy to use, as well as safe for devices.
SlideBlockWebOrientDesc.3: In addition, Dolon can be used on a variety of devices, including personal computers and mobile devices such as tablets and smartphones, regardless of operating system.
SlideBlockWebOrientDesc.4: These features make Dolon an ideal choice for businesses aiming to optimize their operations and increase productivity.

SlideBlockFlexDesc.1: The Dolon platform has a customizable and flexible framework that can easily adapt to the unique needs of your business, whether you need to add new functionality or modify existing functionality.
SlideBlockFlexDesc.2: With Dolon, you can enjoy all the benefits of a fully customized solution without the time and expense associated with developing a system from scratch. So, if you need a system that is perfect for your business, Dolon is the best choice.
SlideBlockFlexDesc.3: English Кроме того, Dolon можно использовать на различных устройствах, включая персональные компьютеры и мобильные устройства, такие как планшеты и смартфоны, независимо от операционной системы.
SlideBlockFlexDesc.4: English Эти особенности делают Dolon идеальным выбором для предприятий, стремящихся оптимизировать свою деятельность и повысить производительность.

SlideBlockSingleDesc.1: Dolon's centralized database is the ideal solution for managing, organizing, and storing  company's data. Due to our powerful platform users will have access to the following benefits:
SlideBlockSingleDesc.2: •	Real-time data updates: stay up-to-date with our system's ability to provide the most up-to-date information at all times.
SlideBlockSingleDesc.3: English Кроме того, Dolon можно использовать на различных устройствах, включая персональные компьютеры и мобильные устройства, такие как планшеты и смартфоны, независимо от операционной системы.
SlideBlockSingleDesc.4: English Эти особенности делают Dolon идеальным выбором для предприятий, стремящихся оптимизировать свою деятельность и повысить производительность.

SlideBlockNoHidenDesc.1: English Dolon — это кроссплатформенное решение на основе веб-технологий, которое обладает рядом ключевых преимуществ по сравнению с традиционными десктопными приложениями.
SlideBlockNoHidenDesc.2: English С Dolon вы можете получить доступ к системе из любого места, где есть подключение к Интернету, без необходимости устанавливать приложение на ваше устройство. Это делает его быстрым и удобным в использовании, а также безопасным для вашего устройства.
SlideBlockNoHidenDesc.3: English Кроме того, Dolon можно использовать на различных устройствах, включая персональные компьютеры и мобильные устройства, такие как планшеты и смартфоны, независимо от операционной системы.
SlideBlockNoHidenDesc.4: English Эти особенности делают Dolon идеальным выбором для предприятий, стремящихся оптимизировать свою деятельность и повысить производительность.

EcoContent.1: Dolon is revolutionizing the data flow of the mining and exploration industry by seamlessly integrating data across multiple departments and work areas. The cloud technologies used by the platform allow specialists to work with a single database and have access to them from almost any device. This concept has led to the creation of a unique Dolon ecosystem, where all solutions are integrated with each other and work as a single mechanism.
EcoContent.2: The system is web-based and cross-platform, which makes it easy to access and use on any device.
EcoContent.3: The flexibility built into the very core of Dolon allows you to customize and adapt the system to your specific production tasks and needs.
EcoContent.4: By using robust open source solutions, you are not dependent on specific DBMS like SQL, Oracle, etc.
EcoContent.5: Server licenses are not tied to specific devices, so you can access Dolon from anywhere in the world and work site.
EcoContent.6: If you suddenly find yourself without a connection, Dolon's offline mode will allow you to work even without access to a single database.

EcoPlashka: With unique capabilities, Dolon simplifies information flow for exploration and mining companies around the world, giving users the freedom, flexibility and teamwork

contuctUs.mainContuctUsText: IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN THE PRODUCT PLEASE CONTACT US AND WE WILL ORGANIZE YOU AN ONLINE PRESENTATION
contuctUs.ecoContuctUsText: If you would like more information, please contact us.
contuctUs.interesting: If you are interested in the product, please contact us and we will arrange an online presentation for you.
